participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: adventurous and open-minded, enjoys trying new things.
participant_1.background: i'm not a good swimmer at all. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: hardworking and passionate about nature, enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.
